title: Monday Morning Critic: Krisily Kennedy Reviews American Sniper
description:
Get tickets & showtimes: regmovi.es/15mjer1 

Welcome back to Monday Morning Critic with Krisily Kennedy! This week, Krisily is reviewing American Sniper based on YOUR feedback in the comments on last week's episode. 

What did you see this weekend? What do you think Krisily should see this week? Leave your answers in the comments below or tweet @regalmovies with #REGmmc and join us again next week for Monday Morning Critic.

With: Krisily Kennedy, American Sniper, Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Jake McDorman, Luke Grimes, Navid Negahban, Chris Kyle, Navy SEALS, Monday Morning Critic
